If you haven't already, you will need to: Če še niste, boste morali prenesti elementary OS z naše spletne strani. S spodnjimi napotki si lahko pomagate pri kopiranju prenešene ISO datoteke na USB pomnilniški ključek.
elementary OS is currently built for two: elementary OS je trenutno na voljo za 32-bitno in 64-bitno procesorsko arhitekturo.
If you know you have a newer computer wi: Če  imate novejši računalnik z 64-bitnim procesorjem izberite 64-bitno različico
If your computer is older or you do not: Izberite 32-bitno različico, če je računalnik starejši ali pa ne veste tip procesorja. (64-bitni procesorji bodo vseeno lahko poganjali to različico).
Make sure to back your important data up: Poskrbite, da shranite varnostno kopijo pomembnih podatkov na zunanji trdi disk ali oblačno storitev. Vaši že obstoječi podatki se lahko izgubijo med nameščanjem novega operacijskega sistema.
Select the operating system you are curr: Select the operating system you are currently using to view tailored installation instructions.
Verifying your download is an important,: Verifying your download is an important, but optional step. We generate a checksum (or hash sum) for elementary OS images and we recommend that you verify that your download matches that checksum before trying to install. This ensures that you've received the full, complete download and that your install image is not corrupted in any way.
Windows doesn't include a built-in tool: Windows doesn't include a built-in tool to verify SHA256 Checksums, so you're going to need to download Hash Tool.
Under &quot;Input File&quot; select <cod: Under "Input File" select Select File(s) and find the elementary OS ISO file
Verify that the text in &quot;Results&qu: Verify that the text in "Results" matches one of the following hashes
Begin with a spare USB flash drive with: Začni z odvečnim USB pogonom, z vsaj 1 GB prostega prostora.
You'll also need a small application cal: Potrebovali boste tudi aplikacijo Rufus. Prenesete jo lahko z njihove spletne strani. Ko jo zaženete se bo odprlo okno podobno temu:
You can now insert your USB drive and se: Sedaj lahko vstaviš tvoj USB pogon in ga izbereš v seznamu naprav. Po tem, izberi "ISO slika pogona" v "Ustvari zagonski pogon z uporabo..." in klikni
to choose the ISO that you downloaded pr: da izberete ISO, katerega ste pred tem prenesli.
Click &quot;Start&quot;, then just wait: Klikni "Start", potem samo počakaj, da se proces samodejno zaključi.
In order to start the installation proce: In order to start the installation process, you must boot your computer from the install drive.
Assuming that your computer is still on,: Predvideno, da je tvoj računalnik še vedno prižgan, vtakni namestitveni medij in ponovno zaženi računalnik.
Most computers will briefly allow you to: Most computers will briefly allow you to change the boot order for this boot only by pressing a special key — usually <kbd>F12</kbd>, but sometimes <kbd>Esc</kbd> or another function key. Refer to the screen or your computer's documentation to be sure.
Press <kbd>F12</kbd> (or the appropriate: Press <kbd>F12</kbd> (or the appropriate key) and select the install drive—usually "USB-HDD" or something containing the word "USB", but the wording may vary. If you choose the incorrect drive, your computer will likely continue to boot as normal. Just restart your computer and pick a different drive in that menu.
Shortly after selecting the appropriate: Shortly after selecting the appropriate boot drive, you should be presented with the elementary OS splash screen. You may now follow the on-screen instructions which will guide you through the rest of the process.
Running the following command in your te: Running the following command in your terminal:
Before creating an install drive, make s: Before creating an install drive, make sure you have all OS X updates installed. To check for available updates, open the Apple Menu and select either "Software Update…" or "App Store…" Make sure to install any OS updates in addition to ones labeled with "Firmware" and "Boot Camp".
You'll need a small application called &: You'll need a small application called "Create elementary Installer". Download the latest version from here, uncompress it, and open the app to launch it. If your Mac cannot open it because it's from an unidentifiable developer, right (or control) click the app, and click "Open".
Insert your spare USB drive, and in the: Insert your spare USB drive, and in the window below, select the ISO file you've just downloaded.
Next, select your USB drive to start the: Next, select your USB drive to start the installer creation process.
If your Mac doesn't recognize the result: If your Mac doesn't recognize the resulting drive in the boot menu, you may need to create an elementary OS Install DVD instead. To create one, insert a blank DVD, right click on the ISO file in Finder, and select "Burn elementaryos-freya-xx.xx.iso to Disc".
After you hear the chime, press and hold: After you hear the chime, press and hold <kbd>Option</kbd>. Then, select the appropriate boot drive. Note that it may be incorrectly identified as "Windows", but this is normal.
You'll also need a small application cal: You'll also need a small application called UNetbootin. To install it, just click this link.
Open UNetbootin from the Dash. It will o: Open UNetbootin from the Dash. It will open a window like the one below:
Make sure &quot;Diskimage&quot; is selec: Preveri ali je "Diskimage" izbran in klikni "..." da izbereš tisto ISO sliko pogona, ki si jo prej prenesel/-a. Odklopi vse USB spomiske naprave, razen tistega, ki ga želiš uporabiti. Klikni "OK" in počakaj, da se proces konča.
